title: 【Furnicraft Addon】家具工艺——装饰你的世界吧！【1.10-1.16】
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 PQguanfang 于 2021-2-22 05:58 编辑 

家具工艺——装饰你的世界吧！This add-on adds many decorations, more villagers. There is everything from kitchen utensils and bathroom equipment to things like a stove, shower products and entertainment-related things, like a pool table and a PC for games. It is a great addon if you want more options to decorate your home.这个MOD添加了许多装饰和更多的村民，从厨房餐具和浴FHC翻译室设备到火炉、淋浴产品和娱乐相关的家具，像桌球台、带有游戏的电脑，应有尽有。如果你想要更多的装饰选择，这个MOD可以满足你。作者: ROBERTGAMER69, Twitter Account, YouTube 图片展示它是如何使用的？Since most furniture is an entity, this means that you can easily rotate the furniture in any direction you want. Some furniture, such as chairs and sofas, also have some functionality in that sense so you can sit on them. Currently all the furniture is in the creative inventory when looking for FURNICRAFT and you will see all the furniture there. You can use a hoe to rotate furniture.因为家具是一个实体，所以你可以轻易地旋转到任何你想要的角度。一些家具，比如椅子和沙发，都可以坐上去。一般来说所有的家具都能在创造模式物品栏FURNICRAFT里找到。用锄头可以旋转家具。家具列表    Trampoline
    Swing
    Slide
    Trampoline for the pool
    Christmas tree
    Gamer PC Set

    Etc…ental Gameplay" in the world settings    蹦床
    秋千

    台球桌
    大型嚼口香糖机
    小型嚼口香糖机
    游戏机
    Teddies machine

    壁橱（16种材料）
    沙滩椅（16种颜色）

    扶手椅（16种颜色）
    灯具（16种颜色）
    游戏椅（16种颜色）

    小桌子（16种材料）
    大桌子（16种材料）
    长凳（16种材料）

    电视（16种颜色）

    等等……如何获得？First you will have to obtain the clay for furniture, its elaboration is the following:第一步，你需要获得做家具的黏土，合成表如下：
When you have the clay for the furniture, you will have to get a stone cutter to get the furniture.
Here is an example of how furniture is obtained in the stone cutter:当你获得做家具的黏土后，你需要切石机来获得家具
如下是一些例子：
and with that done you can get all the furniture in survival
Obviously you can also find them in the creative inventory
完成后你可以在生存获得所有家具
自然的，你可以才创造模式的物品栏里找到他们The ROTADOR was also added to rotate the furniture can also be obtained with the stone cutter…
ROTADOR也被添加用于旋转家具，同样可以从切石机中获得如何获得妻子和孩子？First you will have to look for your future wife and trade with her until you have the option of having a child
NPCs are found in the villages
Here is an example of how the NPC inventory looks首先你将要寻找你未来的妻子，和他交易，直到你可以选择要一个孩子。NPC可以从村庄里找到。以下是一个例子：

如何获得戒指？You will have to crawl with the Rose Gold ore that can be found in mines or caves throughout the world.
its probability of appearing is average
but if you go to a village below them you can find a lot of rose gold ore.你需要找到玫瑰金矿石，在村庄下面尤为多。它的合成表如下：
怎么让孩子认我为父/母？You will have to put your child in the crib and give him 1 diamond to become a child
(this can take approximately 5 minutes)
when your child is out of the cradle you must feed him with any of the following foods to make him grow
(cake, apple, sugar, golden apple)
Here is an example of how NPCs look你可以把你的孩子放在婴儿床里并给他一个钻石，让他变成一个孩子（这个过程大约花费5分钟）
当你的孩子出了摇篮后你必须喂养他来让他成长（比如蛋糕、苹果、糖、金苹果）
以下是一个例子：

you can crackle them with the rose gold ore that you find in mines and below the villages
Here is an example of how they crafting你可以用你在矿山和村庄下面找到的玫瑰金矿石来敲碎它们
以下是合成表
你可以从作者的网站了解更多：https://furnicraftrg69.wixsite.com/home安装Download Resources .McPack
Download Behaviors .McPack
Apply the packs for a world
Enable "Experimental Gameplay" in the world settings
Create the world下载材质包（Resources .McPack）和行为包（Behaviors .McPack）
将MOD应用于世界
在设置中启用“实验性游戏测试”
创建世界下载注：新版分为方块版与实体版，如果旧版MC无法使用，可以下载实体版
链接: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1Ldj7Gj859YJn4JxfjOuXPw
提取码: f7bp
